cu.explanation_en: Setting the local S port C to 0 causes port binding failures and prevents SCTP connections.

du.explanation_en: Setting DL absolute frequency point A to 0 causes frequency misalignment, leading to cell configuration and synchronization failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 DL 絕對頻率點 A 設定為 0 會導致頻率錯位，造成小區配置和同步失敗。
